publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7026 Joe FitzPatrick: Suicide Prevention Week—That the Parliament congratulates the Samaritans on what is seen as its successful 2010 Suicide Prevention Week campaign in conjunction with many partners, including Health Scotland, local authorities and Network Rail; notes that rates of suicide remain highest in young men across Scotland, and applauds the efforts of groups such as the Samaritans on tackling this across the nation.

S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Bob Doris*, Christine Grahame*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Karen Whitefield*, Nanette Milne*, Mary Scanlon*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Butler*
S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Linda Fabiani*, Willie Coffey*, Bill Wilson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Nigel Don*, Jack McConnell*, Gil Paterson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Marlyn Glen*

S3M-7026 Joe FitzPatrick: Suicide Prevention Week—That the Parliament congratulates the Samaritans on what is seen as its successful 2010 Suicide Prevention Week campaign in conjunction with many partners, including Health Scotland, local authorities and Network Rail; notes that rates of suicide remain highest in young men across Scotland, and applauds the efforts of groups such as the Samaritans on tackling this across the nation. Supported by: Jackie Baillie, Bob Doris, Christine Grahame, Alasdair Allan, Jamie Hepburn, Rob Gibson, Karen Whitefield, Nanette Milne, Mary Scanlon, Brian Adam, Stuart McMillan, Sandra White, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Bill Kidd, Bill Butler, Linda Fabiani, Willie Coffey, Bill Wilson, Kenneth Gibson, Liam McArthur, Hugh Henry, Nigel Don, Jack McConnell, Gil Paterson, Dr Richard Simpson, Marlyn Glen, Michael Matheson*
S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Maureen Watt*
S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Tom McCabe*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Irene Oldfather*
S3M-7026 Suicide Prevention Week (lodged on 20 September 2010) Ken Macintosh*
